description: Identifier of the user or service account that executed the global data change job.
Timestamp when this configuration record was last modified.
Original data value targeted for replacement by the change rule.
Replacement value written when the change rule is applied.
Indicator to force applying the change even if validations fail or no exact match; confirm with SME.
Name or identifier of the change script or rule set this row belongs to, such as the target field or domain.
Sequence number determining processing order within the script.
Flag indicating whether this change row has been executed.
Number of records updated when this change row last executed.
Timestamp when this change row was last executed.
User or service account that created this configuration record.
Timestamp when this configuration record was created.
User or service account that last modified this configuration record.
